body_html:
Hi,

This specific error is because the input is not the right size, you should use chan_in*groups for the size of x in the test, no?

I expect you get another error after fixing this as I did not checked the implementation for groups (my bad sorry).

body:
Hi,

This specific error is because the input is not the right size, you should use `chan_in*groups` for the size of `x` in the test, no?

I expect you get another error after fixing this as I did not checked the implementation for groups (my bad sorry).
